trends: There has been one other sighting in Parry Sound
There were no other sightings in Parry Sound on or around August 8th 2011
Summary: Orange orb started low on the eastern horizon across lake , flew slow and straight for approximately 10 minutes in a westerly direction, maybe 10000 feet and slowly rising towards the moon, then disappearing in the moonlight.
divs: Sighting DetailsOrange orb started low on the eastern horizon across lake , flew slow and straight for approximately 10 minutes in a westerly direction, maybe 10000 feet and slowly rising towards the moon, then disappearing in the moonlight.
